Texts.Chs: 把^orange;熔火核心^reset;带回orange;科学前哨站^reset;
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Molten Core^reset; to the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我正在设法修理这个继电器，但那该死的东西就是不肯让步。我急需它来找一个朋友。也许你能在^orange;物质汇编机^reset;里制作一个^orange;熔火核心^reset;？那应该能解决我的困境。
Texts.Eng: I'm trying to fix this relay, but the damned thing just won't relent. I desperately need to reach a friend. Could you perhaps craft a ^orange;Molten Core^reset; in your ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset;? That should solve my predicament.

Texts.Chs: 成功了，谢谢！ 真奇怪。^green;德尔塔·弗雷亚II上面的实验室^reset;没有传出信号。甚至连静电干扰都没有。我得调查一下。感谢这个核心，它将在很大程度上帮助了这次通讯。
Texts.Eng: That did it, thanks!...hmm, that's odd. No signal from the ^green;lab on Delta Freya II^reset;. Not even static. I'll have to investigate this. Thanks for this Core, it will go a long way to helping communications here.
